about_the_game:
Step with Ethan Sterling and embark on a captivating journey through the cursed Sterling Family Carnival.



You play as Ethan Sterling, armed with a revolver, trying to uncover all the dark secrets of the Sterling family's past. Fight enemies and solve puzzles to discover the truth behind the curse hidden in the depths of Carnival. With each victory over the bosses, more new secrets of the Sterling family are revealed to Ethan.

Will Ethan uncover the secrets of his lineage and end the nightmare, or will he become another victim consumed by the Carnival's evil forces?



  • Horror Atmosphere: Explore a horror set in a cursed amusement park filled with suspenseful encounters and dark atmospheres.
  • Puzzles: Encounter intricate puzzles throughout the Carnival, challenging your wit and uncovering hidden mysteries.
  • Boss Fights: Fight with terrifying bosses, each with unique abilities and weaknesses.
  • Revolver Upgrade System: Customize your weapon with new ammunition and dark magic enhancements to combat the evil forces.
  • Rich Narrative: Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative woven with the tragic history of the Sterling family and the ancient curse haunting the Carnival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Carnival is a first-person horror game that immerses you in a cursed amusement park. Explore eerie attractions, solve puzzles, confront bosses, and upgrade your arsenal. Uncover the secrets of the Sterling family amidst relentless darkness.
